DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy Phytotherapy `` Raylis '' ( Ginseng Root Powder 50 mg , False Ginseng Root Powder 50 mg , Codonopsis Root Powder 50 mg , Astragalus Membranaceus Root Powder 50 mg , Epimedium Alpinum Herbal Extract 100 mg ) In Congestive Processes Of The Pelvic Organs ( Prostatostasis ) In Congestive Processes Of The Pelvic Organs ( Prostatostasis )
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Phytotherapy `` Raylis '' In Congestive Processes Of The Pelvic Organs ( Prostatostasis )
DOC.criteria: Age 2060 year Symptoms prostatostasis last least 3 month past 6 month : Pathological change uroflowmetry ( maximum flow rate le 15 ml / , average urinary flow rate le 12 ml / sec ) TRUS Prostate volume 22 ml TRUS TRUS picture Prostatostasis IPSS 720 IIEF5 ) 1221 Contraindications limitation use drug Raylis list instruction medical use * Diabetes mellitus ( type 1 type 2 , decompensation ) Neurogenic disorder ( acute cerebral circulatory disorder , Alzheimer 's disease , spinal cord injury ) A history pelvic trauma Patients undergone radical prostatectomy surgical intervention pelvic organ Concomitant use supplement improve erectile function , use antiandrogens , antidepressant , finasteride .
